channel.title: Ideas on knuxyl.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Ideas on knuxyl.github.io

item.title: Some Ideas
item.description: The truth can never be reflected by a copy, nor can it include time, and is only available within the limits of your awareness of the now. I need to work on the explanation of how free will is an illusion, but trying to find the right words while talking to a non-critical thinker to let them see the truth has proven to be a seemingly endless battle. this idea is paramount to existence, if society had this in it’s foundation we would not focus on punishment rather than prevention.

item.title: WIP New Bill of Rights
item.description: 1) Humans have the right to self-protection and preservation, which explicitly includes unrestricted ownership of any and all weapons and/or tools used by any and all entities used to police them. This explicitly includes no requirements for tests, registrations, waivers, and insurance. Humans have the right to hold any weapon(s) and/or tool(s) in any place and time as any entity used to police humans is allowed to hold the same weapon(s) and/or tool(s).
